1000.name: ErrInvalidRequestCode
1000.long_description: The Graphql query requested is invalid
1000.suggested_remediation: Check the query parameters and syntax of the query being run

1001.name: ErrNilClientCode
1001.long_description: Kubernetes config is not initialized with Meshery
1001.suggested_remediation: Upload your kubernetes config via the settings dashboard. If uploaded, wait for a minute for it to get initialized

1003.name: ErrQueryCode
1003.long_description: Invalid Query performed in Meshery Database

1004.name: ErrMeshsyncSubscriptionCode
1004.suggested_remediation: Check if meshery server is reachable from the browser

1005.name: ErrOperatorSubscriptionCode
1005.suggested_remediation: Check if meshery server is reachable from the browser

1006.name: ErrAddonSubscriptionCode
1006.suggested_remediation: Check if meshery server is reachable from the browser

1007.name: ErrControlPlaneSubscriptionCode
1007.long_description: GraphQL subscription for Control Plane stopped
1007.suggested_remediation: Check if meshery server is reachable from the browser

1011.name: ErrNoExternalEndpointCode
1011.short_description: Unable to find the External Endpoint
1011.probable_cause:
The service might not be exposed to External IP
Meshsync cache is outdated
